text: Ah, finally uploaded this one I see. And I agree to your comment as well; very ambient and calm. I wouldn't mind playing a Skies of Arcadia 2 either, but I highly doubt that's ever going to come. But I guess that will just make this game more valuable; as the one and only game of the franchise.
